column1: Personalizing Session-based Recommendations with Hierarchical Recurrent Neural Networks
Session-based recommendations are highly relevant in many modern on-line services (e.g. e-commerce
column2: video streaming) and recommendation settings. Recently
column3: Recurrent Neural Networks have been shown to perform very well in session-based settings. While in many session-based recommendation domains user identifiers are hard to come by
column4: there are also domains in which user profiles are readily available. We propose a seamless way to personalize RNN models with cross-session information transfer and devise a Hierarchical RNN model that relays end evolves latent hidden states of the RNNs across user sessions. Results on two industry datasets show large improvements over the session-only RNNs.
